(11) Basic designs for new school construction will have to be
modified to facilitate the use of ITV and other new teaching
aids. For example, space will have to be convertible for groups
of various sizes; means will have to be provided for adapting all
rooms quickly to ITV, films and individual teaching machines.
Building plans must include provision for adequate power and conduits.
(12) ITV experiments in Dade County (Florida), Pennsylvania State
University, and elsewhere indicate that (a) substantial savings may
be obtained without impairing quality of instruction and (b) some
conservation of instructional manpower is achieved.
(13) ITV can be used effectively for organized teacher training in
colleges and universities, as well as for on-the-job instruction.
